Package uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.cache

Interface Cache<K,V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LRUCache, TimedLRUCache

    public interface Cache<K,V>
    Author:
    Matt Pearce

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clear​()
      Clear the cache, emptying all internal storage.
      V get​(K key)
      Get the cache entry for the given key.
      void put​(K key, V value)
      Put a value in the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        V get​(K key)
        Get the cache entry for the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the cached value of the key, or null if the key does not exist in the cache.

      • put

        void put​(K key,
         V value)
  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Put a value in the cache. Any previously existing value with the same key will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        key - the key for the value.
        value - the value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either key or value is null.

      • clear

        void clear​()
        Clear the cache, emptying all internal storage.
